physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Erythematous eruption on face and upper aspect of trunk, resolved with topical corticosteroids.
Recurrent skin lesions, myalgias, proximal muscle weakness, and hypophonia.
Elevated creatine kinase (301 U/L), elevated aldolase, positive antinuclear antibody at 1:640 titer.
Normotensive. Noted loss of substance in subcutaneous tissue of the front of her left thigh.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Lipoatrophy progressed to involve both thighs.
